embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: It's happening again Riot, the last hop between my connection to your server spikes greatly.  I use new wave communications, can you get a better route to them? Please dont ignore me this time

replies.body:
From what I'm able to gather from these logs, it looks like you're getting high ping spikes before even reaching our servers.  Looking closely here, it looks like your routing is pretty much going all around the country- literally hopping to the west coast and circling back to our servers.  

Your best bet is to contact your ISP and request a Tier 2 specialist who can review your logs.  They'll need to look into why you're bouncing to the west coast instead of your nearest riot direct node.  Hope that helps clear things up, and good luck!
It's not normally like this now, and it just happened again, I lost my platinum promos because of this. Normally I get a 27 ping on the same route. Are you sure it's going around the whole country?
